ui.title: Language Barista
ui.subtitle: Professional Language Guide for Baristas. Learn English and French sentences.
ui.footer: Using Web Speech API for text-to-speech functionality

items.english: Welcome to our coffee shop!
items.translation: Welcome to our coffee shop!

items.english: Good morning, how can I help you today?
items.translation: Good morning, how can I help you today?

items.english: What can I get started for you?
items.translation: What can I get started for you?

items.english: Would you like a hot Americano?
items.translation: Would you like a hot Americano?

items.english: I can make a fresh Cappuccino for you.
items.translation: I can make a fresh Cappuccino for you.

items.english: Would you like a large Latte or a medium one?
items.translation: Would you like a large Latte or a medium one?

items.english: I recommend trying our Flat White.
items.translation: I recommend trying our Flat White.

items.english: Do you prefer hot drinks or iced drinks?
items.translation: Do you prefer hot drinks or iced drinks?

items.english: We also have a variety of blended drinks.
items.translation: We also have a variety of blended drinks.

items.english: Would you like it with coffee or without coffee?
items.translation: Would you like it with coffee or without coffee?

items.english: I'd like a strong coffee, please.
items.translation: I'd like a strong coffee, please.

items.english: What type of milk would you like in your drink?
items.translation: What type of milk would you like in your drink?

items.english: What flavor would you like to add today?
items.translation: What flavor would you like to add today?

items.english: We have Caramel and Vanilla syrups available.
items.translation: We have Caramel and Vanilla syrups available.

items.english: Would you like sugar-free vanilla or sugar-free caramel?
items.translation: Would you like sugar-free vanilla or sugar-free caramel?

items.english: We also have Raspberry and Mango flavours.
items.translation: We also have Raspberry and Mango flavours.

items.english: Would you like me to make it sweet?
items.translation: Would you like me to make it sweet?

items.english: Do you want ice cubes or crushed ice?
items.translation: Do you want ice cubes or crushed ice?

items.english: Would you like some whipped cream on top?
items.translation: Would you like some whipped cream on top?

items.english: Would you like it warm or at room temperature?
items.translation: Would you like it warm or at room temperature?

items.english: Would you like something to eat with that?
items.translation: Would you like something to eat with that?

items.english: We have fresh sandwiches, muffins, and croissants.
items.translation: We have fresh sandwiches, muffins, and croissants.

items.english: Would you like to try one of our donuts?
items.translation: Would you like to try one of our donuts?

items.english: Would you like a sandwich combo or a muffin combo?
items.translation: Would you like a sandwich combo or a muffin combo?

items.english: We also offer a donut combo and a lunch combo.
items.translation: We also offer a donut combo and a lunch combo.

items.english: Would you like to eat here or take away?
items.translation: Would you like to eat here or take away?

items.english: Would you like to pay by card or cash?
items.translation: Would you like to pay by card or cash?

items.english: Do you want some water? Cold or room temperature?
items.translation: Do you want some water? Cold or room temperature?

items.english: Enjoy your drink!
items.translation: Enjoy your drink!
